ygData.subject: Re: Today's patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, does paladin LoH reset when they die?  If not, we could complain that now Paladins get an unfair advantage in successive duels.  :) Laluni
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, does paladin LoH reset when they die? If not, we could complain that now Paladins get an unfair
advantage in successive duels. :)

Laluni

"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>
> damn, i used this last night so i could at least have 1 dirge in each of the
> 4 duels i had with the rogue. have to space duels out every 30 min i guess.
>
> "Sorry gotta grab something to eat, see you in 30 min for our next duel" =)
>
> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L41 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
